title: Automobile Liability Insurance Company Reporting Requirements
text_content:
Insurance companies licensed to do business in Virginia are required to provide to the Department of Motor Vehicles (DMV) monthly electronic updates of insured's information and vehicle descriptions when new policies are written or when vehicles are added to or deleted from existing policies for motor vehicles registered in Virginia
If your company is interested in a secure transfer option with DMV, please indicate your interest by submitting a short
Survey
(Google Chrome preferred).
For reporting requirements, reference the
Automobile Liability Insurance Reporting - Business Guide
.
Additional Information
For help with reporting questions, new company startups, or changing contact information, please send an email to
InsuranceACK@dmv.virginia.gov
.
